title: Triangle Game
description: A game made in the Unity engine using C#. Players have to try and get the highest score by hitting the incoming enemies with their projectiles of the same shape. WASD or on screen D-PAD to change firing direction. Click on the shape to fire that projectile or JKL on PC.

title: Pool Party
description: A game made in the Unity engine using C#. It is a local multiplayer game where the players try to run around on a snooker table in an attempt to not get squashed by a ball. Inspitation for this project was taken from the Pool Party minigame on Wii Party U. Click to start. Player 1 uses WASD to move whilst player 2 uses arrow keys.

title: Boxed In
description: A VR game made in the Unity engine using C#. The game features a complex procedural world generation algorithm so the playing area changes each time the player starts the game. The is a FPS where the player tries to survive as long as possible whilst battling waves of ghouls. A VR game made in the Unity engine using C#. The game features a complex procedural world generation algorithm so the playing area changes each time the player starts the game. The is a FPS where the player tries to survive as long as possible whilst battling waves of ghouls. A mobile version was also made.
